content: lternative airport | |   priority | `'string'` | Priority of the alternative airport | |   distance | `'string'` | Distance of the alternative airport in KMs| |   extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information of the alternative airport | | ctot | `'datetime'` | Calculated take off time in UTC | | boardingStartDate | `'datetime'` | Boarding start date in UTC | | estimatedEnrouteTime | `'string'` | Estimated enroute time in minutes | | traffic | `'string'` | The Flight Leg Traffic Indicator classifies flight legs as International, Domestic, or Non-Commercial. It may be assigned a Non-Commercial value in cases where the flight leg serves purposes such as positioning, repositioning, registration, etc. | | slotStatus | `'string'` | Status of the flight leg slot. SAM: Slot allocation is received with Calculated Take-Off Time (CTOT). SLC: A Slot Requirement Cancellation message is received, as the EOBT of the flight is not realistic anymore. SIP: Slot Improvement Proposal is received wiht a NEWCTOT. A response is expected from the airline operator. FLS: Flight is suspended. FSH: Flight Shift message is received. RRP: Rerouting Proposal message is received offering a different CTOT or to avoid the need for a slot on the new route. SRM: After an initial SAM, subsequent updates are sent via the Slot Revision Message. DES: A flight which was previously suspended is now de-suspended. PRE: Pre-allocated. The incoming message contains CTOT, but no official ATC slot is assigned to the leg. | | legVersion | `'string'` | Version of the flight leg updates, the number of the flight leg changes | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Flight Leg Times Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | legId | `'string'` | Flight leg identifier | | source | `'string'` | Source of time information. NA = Netline Acars, NF = Netline eFLB, NM = Netline Movement, etc. | | type | `'strin
